messages.message: @arun and @Aaron Vontell do we have any plans on how we will alleviate the issue if it happens again?
I believe this is covered in Arunâ€™s retro, @arun want to sync today to wrap this up?
Will update here once I sync with Arun

Sounds good.  I would like to see two things:
1. What do I do if this starts to happen again: I have turned up the CPU and memory for now, and it is not a good longer term solution.  
2. What caused the job-status JSON to become so big, can we make sure that it is smaller in size so that we can load it in quickly and paginate through it quickly?
